name: Strength of the Sword ULTIMATE
description: A Fighting game combined with a BRAWLER! With a huge sword, rocket launcher and a FLAMETHROWER!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core 2 Duo, 1.6 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 compatible video card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: XAudio compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Core i3 or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible video card DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: XAudio compatible sound card
